SEARCH
Package tester

Class staffTester

java.lang.Object
tester.staffTester
public class staffTester extends Object

Title: staffTester Class

*

Description: JUnit test class for validating the functionality specific to staff/moderator roles within the application's database layer. This includes post flagging, private messaging, retrieving flagged posts, and end-to-end workflow testing.

* @author Aaron Shih (Based on previous test author)
Version:
1.00 2025-11-12 Initial implementation

    Constructs a new instance of the staffTester class.

  • Constructor Details

    • staffTester

      public staffTester()
      Constructs a new instance of the staffTester class. This constructor is used by JUnit to instantiate the test class.

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      public void setUp()
      Sets up the test environment before each test method. Establishes a database connection, initializes moderation tables, and creates necessary test users (staff and students).

    • tearDown

      public void tearDown()
      Tears down the test environment after each test method. Closes the database connection.

    • test1_1_StaffSuccessfullyFlagsPost

      public void test1_1_StaffSuccessfullyFlagsPost()
      Test case 1.1: Verifies that a staff user can successfully flag an existing post. Also checks if the post's flagged status is updated in the database.

    • test1_2_FlagNonExistentPost

      public void test1_2_FlagNonExistentPost()
      Test case 1.2: Attempts to flag a post that does not exist. Asserts that the operation fails gracefully.

    • test2_1_SendMessageLinkedToPost

      public void test2_1_SendMessageLinkedToPost()
      Test case 2.1: Verifies that a staff user can send a private message linked to a specific post.

    • test2_2_SendMessageToNonExistentUser

      public void test2_2_SendMessageToNonExistentUser()
      Test case 2.2: Attempts to send a private message to a non-existent user. Asserts that the message creation fails.

    • test3_1_RetrieveAllInboxMessages

      public void test3_1_RetrieveAllInboxMessages()
      Test case 3.1: Retrieves all private messages for a user (Inbox). Asserts that the correct number of messages (read and unread) are returned.

    • test3_2_RetrieveInboxWithZeroMessages

      public void test3_2_RetrieveInboxWithZeroMessages()
      Test case 3.2: Retrieves the inbox for a new user with zero messages. Asserts that an empty list is returned.

    • test4_1_MarkMessageAsRead

      public void test4_1_MarkMessageAsRead()
      Test case 4.1: Marks an unread private message as read. Asserts that the operation succeeds and the unread count for the recipient decreases.

    • test4_2_MarkAlreadyReadMessage

      public void test4_2_MarkAlreadyReadMessage()
      Test case 4.2: Attempts to mark an already read message as read again (idempotency check). Asserts that the operation succeeds gracefully.

    • test5_1_StudentRepliesToStaff

      public void test5_1_StudentRepliesToStaff()
      Test case 5.1: Verifies a student can successfully reply to a staff message. Checks that the reply links to the parent message and that the staff user's unread count increases.

    • test5_2_ReplyWithInvalidParentId

      public void test5_2_ReplyWithInvalidParentId()
      Test case 5.2: Attempts to create a reply using an invalid parent message ID. Asserts that the reply creation fails.

    • test6_1_StudentCannotViewOthersMessages

      public void test6_1_StudentCannotViewOthersMessages()
      Test case 6.1: Verifies that a user can only view their own messages and not messages intended for other users.

    • test6_2_NonStaffCannotFlagPosts

      public void test6_2_NonStaffCannotFlagPosts()
      Test case 6.2: Verifies that a staff member can flag a post (base check). This test is redundant but kept for original structure.

    • test7_1_StaffRetrievesAllFlaggedPosts

      public void test7_1_StaffRetrievesAllFlaggedPosts()
      Test case 7.1: Verifies that staff can retrieve a list of all flagged posts. Asserts that the flags are correctly created and the posts are marked.

    • test7_2_DashboardWithZeroFlags

      public void test7_2_DashboardWithZeroFlags()
      Test case 7.2: Verifies the dashboard logic returns correctly when there are no flags. Assumes a clean setup where previous tests have been reset.

    • test8_1_RetrievePostFromMessageReference

      public void test8_1_RetrievePostFromMessageReference()
      Test case 8.1: Verifies that a post can be successfully retrieved using the ID referenced in a private message.

    • test8_2_MessageReferencesDeletedPost

      public void test8_2_MessageReferencesDeletedPost()
      Test case 8.2: Attempts to retrieve a post using a non-existent ID referenced in a message. Asserts that `getPostById` returns null and that message creation fails if referential integrity is enforced at creation.

    • test10_1_EmptyMessageContent

      public void test10_1_EmptyMessageContent()
      Test case 10.1: Verifies that the database handles a private message with empty content.

    • test10_2_EmptyFlagReason

      public void test10_2_EmptyFlagReason()
      Test case 10.2: Verifies that the database handles a moderation flag with an empty reason.

    • test11_EndToEndWorkflow

      public void test11_EndToEndWorkflow()
      Test case 11: Comprehensive end-to-end workflow test simulating the full moderation process: Flag -> Staff message -> Student reads -> Student replies -> Staff receives reply.
